definition: These combinations are considered extremely harmful and should always be avoided. Reactions to these drugs taken in combination are highly unpredictable and have a potential to cause death.
There is considerable risk of physical harm when taking these combinations, they  should be avoided to minimise harm potential.

These combinations are not usually physically harmful, but may produce undesirable  effects, such as physical discomfort or overstimulation. High-dosage use may cause physical health issues. Synergistic effects may be unpredictable. Care should be taken when choosing to use this combination.
They aren't likely to cause an adverse or undesirable reaction when used carefully. Additional research should always be done before combining drugs.
Effects are unknown. Don't risk it...
